rules_text:
[i]Play Things[/i] – At the beginning of your upkeep, Selkie, Free Spirit deals 1 damage to target player for each token you control.
[i]Crit[/i] – Whenever Selkie, deals combat damage to a player, investigate. [i](Create a Clue token. It's an artifact with “{2}, Sacrifice this artifact: Draw a card.”)[/i]
